chapter.title: Hardware and OS Requirements
chapter.para: We recommend a machine with a 600 Mhz CPU and 256 Mb of RAM. This should cover almost every machine made this century.
If you have older CPU with a newer/upgraded operating system, (like Mac OSX or WinXP) then we strongly recommend that you have at least 256 Mb of RAM ... more is better.

para.emphasis: No specialized video hardware is required.
